snippet: Stan Wawrinka survived a thriller against Mikhail Youzhny in the second round of the Rogers Cup on Tuesday, fighting back in both sets to prevail 7-6(3) 7-6(8).The Swiss second seed trailed 5-4 in the first set and had to break Youzhny's serve to ...
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka survived a thriller against Mikhail Youzhny in the second round of the Rogers Cup on Tuesday, fighting back in both sets to prevail 7-6(3) 7-6(8).The Swiss second seed trailed 5-4 in the first set and had to break Youzhny's serve to force a tiebreak.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Battles Past Youzhny in Toronto
headline.main: Wawrinka Battles Past Youzhny in Toronto
